name: The Simuloid Affair: Infinite Possibilities
summary: You've wanted to be a sim hunter ever since the incident in the Preservation Dome. When you finally made it in the Agency, you put your all into it, deleting simuloids at a rate second only to your partner, rival and best friend, Ursula. And then your routine Mental Diffusion test came back positive. Are you really a simuloid yourself? Are your memories fake? Is being a simuloid actually a bad thing? Is the entire simuloid panic a hoax perpetrated by the Conglomerate?
